architectural_notes: Month selector UI should support horizontal scrolling with partial tab visibility; initial position defaults to current month.
known_issues: Month selector cannot currently scroll to months before May; users are unable to access earlier months.

existing_features.title: Update the month selector in `frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx` so users can horizontally scroll to reach all months (January–December), including months before May, on both desktop (mouse/trackpad) and mobile (touch swipe).

Ensure the month selector allows partial month visibility while scrolling (i.e., tabs can be partially visible at the left/right edges), rather than forcing full-tab snapping or fitting all tabs into the available width.

Keep the default visible/selected month as the current month on initial load, and ensure the selected month tab is brought into view within the scrollable month selector if it would otherwise be off-screen.
Add/extend frontend tests to cover the month selector scrollability regression (months before May must remain reachable).

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the month selector horizontally scrollable so users can scroll through all months (Jan–Dec), allowing partial month visibility, with default visible month remaining the current month.

projectName: Fix MonthTabs horizontal scrolling to access all months (Jan–Dec)
